data.title: Maori leaders in New Zealand's Far North have voted to block Prime Minister John Key from visiting the site where the country's founding document was signed, with one saying "I don't understand why we'd want to welcome a Prime Minister when he has already signed away our sovereignty" (with the TPPA)
